member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.TokenCacheProviders.CacheSerializerHints.CancellationToken
member.summary: CancellationToken enabling cooperative cancellation between threads, thread pool, or Task objects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.TokenCacheProviders.CacheSerializerHints.SuggestedCacheExpiry
member.summary: Suggested cache expiry based on the in-coming token. Use to optimize cache eviction with the app token cache.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.TokenCacheProviders.ICacheSerializer.WriteCacheBytesAsync(System.String,System.Byte[],Microsoft.Identity.Web.TokenCacheProviders.CacheSerializerHints)
member.summary: Method to be overridden by concrete cache serializers to write the cache bytes.
member.param: Hints for the cache serialization implementation optimization.
member.returns: A that represents a completed write operation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.TokenCacheProviders.ICacheSerializer.ReadCacheBytesAsync(System.String,Microsoft.Identity.Web.TokenCacheProviders.CacheSerializerHints)
member.summary: Method to be overridden by concrete cache serializers to Read the cache bytes.
member.param: Hints for the cache serialization implementation optimization.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.TokenCacheProviders.ICacheSerializer.RemoveKeyAsync(System.String,Microsoft.Identity.Web.TokenCacheProviders.CacheSerializerHints)
member.summary: Method to be overridden by concrete cache serializers to remove an entry from the cache.
member.param: Hints for the cache serialization implementation optimization.
member.returns: A that represents a completed remove key operation.
